verses.text: <a href="../1-Chronicles-8-1/" title="1 Chronicles 8:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1  "JESUS_END"Now Benjamin begat Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second, and Aharah the third,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-2/" title="1 Chronicles 8:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2  "JESUS_END"Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-3/" title="1 Chronicles 8:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3  "JESUS_END"And the sons of Bela were, Addar, and Gera, and Abihud,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-4/" title="1 Chronicles 8:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4  "JESUS_END"And Abishua, and Naaman, and Ahoah,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-5/" title="1 Chronicles 8:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5  "JESUS_END"And Gera, and Shephuphan, and Huram.
6 "JESUS_END"And these are the sons of Ehud: these are the heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Geba, and they removed them to Manahath:
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-7/" title="1 Chronicles 8:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7  "JESUS_END"And Naaman, and Ahiah, and Gera, he removed them, and begat Uzza, and Ahihud.
8 "JESUS_END"And Shaharaim begat children in the country of Moab, after he had sent them away; Hushim and Baara were his wives.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-9/" title="1 Chronicles 8:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9  "JESUS_END"And he begat of Hodesh his wife, Jobab, and Zibia, and Mesha, and Malcham,
10 "JESUS_END"And Jeuz, and Shachia, and Mirma. These were his sons, heads of the fathers.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-11/" title="1 Chronicles 8:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11  "JESUS_END"And of Hushim he begat Abitub, and Elpaal.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-12/" title="1 Chronicles 8:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12  "JESUS_END"The sons of Elpaal; Eber, and Misham, and Shamed, who built Ono, and Lod, with the towns thereof:
13 "JESUS_END"Beriah also, and Shema, who were heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Aijalon, who drove away the inhabitants of Gath:
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-14/" title="1 Chronicles 8:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14  "JESUS_END"And Ahio, Shashak, and Jeremoth,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-15/" title="1 Chronicles 8:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15  "JESUS_END"And Zebadiah, and Arad, and Ader,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-16/" title="1 Chronicles 8:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16  "JESUS_END"And Michael, and Ispah, and Joha, the sons of Beriah;
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-17/" title="1 Chronicles 8:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17  "JESUS_END"And Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hezeki, and Heber,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-18/" title="1 Chronicles 8:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18  "JESUS_END"Ishmerai also, and Jezliah, and Jobab, the sons of Elpaal;
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-19/" title="1 Chronicles 8:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19  "JESUS_END"And Jakim, and Zichri, and Zabdi,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-20/" title="1 Chronicles 8:20 KJV verse detail"><span id="22" class="versehover">20  "JESUS_END"And Elienai, and Zilthai, and Eliel,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-21/" title="1 Chronicles 8:21 KJV verse detail"><span id="23" class="versehover">21  "JESUS_END"And Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath, the sons of Shimhi;
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-22/" title="1 Chronicles 8:22 KJV verse detail"><span id="24" class="versehover">22  "JESUS_END"And Ishpan, and Heber, and Eliel,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-23/" title="1 Chronicles 8:23 KJV verse detail"><span id="25" class="versehover">23  "JESUS_END"And Abdon, and Zichri, and Hanan,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-24/" title="1 Chronicles 8:24 KJV verse detail"><span id="26" class="versehover">24  "JESUS_END"And Hananiah, and Elam, and Antothijah,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-25/" title="1 Chronicles 8:25 KJV verse detail"><span id="27" class="versehover">25  "JESUS_END"And Iphedeiah, and Penuel, the sons of Shashak;
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-26/" title="1 Chronicles 8:26 KJV verse detail"><span id="28" class="versehover">26  "JESUS_END"And Shamsherai, and Shehariah, and Athaliah,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-27/" title="1 Chronicles 8:27 KJV verse detail"><span id="29" class="versehover">27  "JESUS_END"And Jaresiah, and Eliah, and Zichri, the sons of Jeroham.
28 "JESUS_END"These were heads of the fathers, by their generations, chief men. These dwelt in Jerusalem.
29 "JESUS_END"And at Gibeon dwelt the father of Gibeon; whose wife's name was Maachah:
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-30/" title="1 Chronicles 8:30 KJV verse detail"><span id="32" class="versehover">30  "JESUS_END"And his firstborn son Abdon, and Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Nadab,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-31/" title="1 Chronicles 8:31 KJV verse detail"><span id="33" class="versehover">31  "JESUS_END"And Gedor, and Ahio, and Zacher.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-32/" title="1 Chronicles 8:32 KJV verse detail"><span id="34" class="versehover">32  "JESUS_END"And Mikloth begat Shimeah. And these also dwelt with their brethren in Jerusalem, over against them.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-33/" title="1 Chronicles 8:33 KJV verse detail"><span id="35" class="versehover">33  "JESUS_END"And Ner begat Kish, and Kish begat Saul, and Saul begat Jonathan, and Malchishua, and Abinadab, and Eshbaal.
34 "JESUS_END"And the son of Jonathan was Meribbaal; and Meribbaal begat Micah.
35 "JESUS_END"And the sons of Micah were, Pithon, and Melech, and Tarea, and Ahaz.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-36/" title="1 Chronicles 8:36 KJV verse detail"><span id="38" class="versehover">36  "JESUS_END"And Ahaz begat Jehoadah; and Jehoadah begat Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begat Moza,
37 "JESUS_END"And Moza begat Binea: Rapha was his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son:
38 "JESUS_END"And Azel had six sons, whose names are these, Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan. All these were the sons of Azel.
39 "JESUS_END"And the sons of Eshek his brother were, Ulam his firstborn, Jehush the second, and Eliphelet the third.
40 "JESUS_END"And the sons of Ulam were mighty men of valour, archers, and had many sons, and sons' sons, an hundred and fifty. All these are of the sons of Benjamin.
